Package islandtrader.core

Class Item

java.lang.Object
islandtrader.core.Entity
islandtrader.core.Tradable
islandtrader.core.Item
public class Item
extends Tradable
Represents an Item of type Tradable that will be traded between Store and Trader. Trader has to sell Item to make profit.
Author:
Maria Heloisa Balzaretti.
